roles.name: Administrator
roles.description: A user with this role is allowed to do any operation on the server

roles.name: Guest
roles.description: A user with this role is allowed to do any read operation on the server

operations.name: Add axiom
operations.description: Add an axiom to the ontology

operations.name: Add ontology annotation
operations.description: Add an annotation to the ontology

operations.name: Add ontology import
operations.description: Add an imported ontology to the ontology

operations.name: Add operation
operations.description: Add an operation to the operation registry

operations.name: Add project
operations.description: Add a project to the project registry

operations.name: Add role
operations.description: Add a role to the role registry

operations.name: Add user
operations.description: Add a user to the user registry

operations.name: Assign role
operations.description: Assign a role to a user within a project

operations.name: Modify operation
operations.description: Modify operation details

operations.name: Modify project
operations.description: Modify project details and options

operations.name: Modify role
operations.description: Modify role details and associated operations

operations.name: Modify server configuration
operations.description: Make changes to the configuration of the server

operations.name: Modify the ontology IRI
operations.description: Modify the IRI of the ontology

operations.name: Modify user
operations.description: Modify user details (name and email address)

operations.name: Open project
operations.description: Open a project in the project registry

operations.name: Remove axiom
operations.description: Remove an axiom from the ontology

operations.name: Remove ontology annotation
operations.description: Remove an annotation from the ontology

operations.name: Remove ontology import
operations.description: Remove an imported ontology from the ontology

operations.name: Remove operation
operations.description: Remove an operation from the operation registry

operations.name: Remove project
operations.description: Remove a project from the project registry

operations.name: Remove role
operations.description: Remove a role from the role registry

operations.name: Remove user
operations.description: Remove a user from the user registry

operations.name: Restart the server
operations.description: Restart the execution of the server

operations.name: Retract role
operations.description: Retract a role from a user

operations.name: Stop the server
operations.description: Stop the execution of the server
